abstract.p: William T Schiano, part-time senior consultant at Thought Bubble Digital Media, New York, is named to new post of president; Steve Frankel, managing director at US corporate and financial practice of Burston-Marsteller, NY, is named to lead new consolidated global team in corporate communications, mergers and other transactions (S)

block.p: * William T. Schiano, a part-time senior consultant at Thought Bubble Digital Media, New York, was named to the new post of president. He is also an assistant professor at Bentley College, Waltham, Mass. * Steve Frankel, managing director at the United States corporate and financial practice of Burston-Marsteller, New York, part of Young & Rubicam, was named to lead a new consolidated global team to specialize in corporate communications for mergers, acquisitions and other transactions.

* William T. Schiano, a part-time senior consultant at Thought Bubble Digital Media, New York, was named to the new post of president. He is also an assistant professor at Bentley College, Waltham, Mass. * Steve Frankel, managing director at the United States corporate and financial practice of Burston-Marsteller, New York, part of Young & Rubicam, was named to lead a new consolidated global team to specialize in corporate communications for mergers, acquisitions and other transactions.
